context.name: Walther Colt Gold Cup 22LR
context.excerpt: The Walther Colt Gold Cup is the competition configuration of the legendary Colt 1911 handgun with competition enhancements. Manufactured exclusively by Walther under license from Colt.
context.content:
The Walther Colt Gold Cup long barrel pistol is the competition configuration of the legendary Colt 1911 handgun. It includes a beavertail grip safety, target sights, skeleton trigger and other competition enhancements.

The Colt 1911 Gold Cup Semi-Automatic Pistol in .22 LR is manufactured exclusively by Walther under license from Colt. It is the only genuine Colt tactical rimfire replica available in the world.

This is a customised 1911 Gold Cup .22 LR with 300mm shrouded barrel and the grip extension to increase the overall length to over 600mm to meet UK legal requirements.

The pistol comes with one 12 round magazine and a hard plastic travel case.

These amazing pistols will shoot standard high velocity and subsonic ammunition by most manufacturers.
